headline: Alight Announces Chief Financial Officer Transition
summary: CHICAGO, December 18, 2025--Alight, Inc. (NYSE: ALIT) ("Alight" or the "Company"), a leading cloud-based human capital and technology-enabled services provider, today announced that Greg Giometti has been named the Company’s Interim Chief Financial Officer, effective January 9, 2026. Giometti, Alight’s Senior Vice President, Head of Financial Planning and Analysis, will succeed Jeremy Heaton, who will depart Alight to pursue an opportunity outside of the benefits administration industry.
